song.englishname: Let The Peace Of God Reign

english.segment1: Father of Life. Draw mi closer. Lord, my heart is set on You. Let me run the race of time. With Your life enfolding mine. And let the peace of God. Let it reign
english.segment2: Oh Holy Spirit. Lord, my comfort. Strengthen m, hold my head up high. And I stan upon Your truth. Bringing glory unto You. And let the peace of God. Let it reign
english.segment3: Oh Lord I hunger. For more of You. Rise up within me. Let me know Your Truth. Oh Holy Spirit. Saturate my Soul. Filll me now. Let Your healing power. Breathe life and make me whole. And let the peace of God. Let it reign
